explains: n. 罗马尼亚人；罗马尼亚语

sentences.en: Revitalizing the Romanian economy will be a long haul.
sentences.cn: 复兴罗马尼亚经济将是一项长期艰巨的工作。

sentences.en: In 1918 the Romanian majority in this former czarist province voted for union with Romania.
sentences.cn: 1918年，这个前沙俄省份的大多数罗马尼亚人投票支持与罗马尼亚合并。

sentences.en: As a Romanian bank clerk in Atlanta puts it, to find a good job "you have to be like a wolf in the forest—able to smell out the best meat."
sentences.cn: 正如亚特兰大一位罗马尼亚银行职员所说，要想找到一份好工作，“你必须像森林里的狼一样，能够嗅出最好的肉。”
